caption.p: ( a) Example of LSV profiles at 1 mV/s and 55 °C. Extracted with permission from ref. [ 17]. Copyright 2020 Elsevier. ( b) and ( c) CV profiles at 60 °C and a scanning rate of 0.1 mV/s; ( b) cathodic stability highlighting the Lithium oxidation/reduction at low potentials (cell configuration: Li/SCE/Cu); and ( c) anodic stability highlighting the oxidation of the electrolyte at high potentials (cell configuration: Li/SCE/Carbon black). Extracted with permission from ref. [ 62]. Copyright 2019 Elsevier.
